notable_project: Moser Consulting developed an e-commerce platform that connects landowners to residents of the currently popular "tiny houses," or homes that are usually under 200 square feet. Moser created a two-sided interactive platform, enabling property owners and potential renters to review past experiences and inform their decisions. The platform has become dominant in the tiny house community, especially given that residents often purchase them such that they can frequently move locations. Moser's product has simplified the renting and living experience for thousands of people and recently added a per-night house rental service, enabling short-term visits to the unique homes.
